list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: expressing adverse or disapproving comments or judgments.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was critical of many U.S. welfare programs
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông rất quan trọng với nhiều chương trình phúc lợi của Hoa Kỳ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: expressing or involving an analysis of the merits and faults of a work of literature, music, or art.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she never won the critical acclaim she sought
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy không bao giờ giành được sự hoan nghênh quan trọng mà cô ấy đã tìm kiếm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a situation or problem) having the potential to become disastrous; at a point of crisis.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the flood waters had not receded, and the situation was still critical
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: vùng nước lũ đã không bị rút lại, và tình hình vẫn còn rất quan trọng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to or denoting a point of transition from one state to another.
(of a nuclear reactor or fuel) maintaining a self-sustaining chain reaction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the reactor is due to go critical in October
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lò phản ứng sẽ đến hạn quan trọng vào tháng 10
